entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Brief snow showers are possible above 900 metres Tuesday night and early Wednesday morning, but little if any snow is expected to settle on the road. The snow level should rise above the summit around dawn on Wednesday.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow showers are expected above 600 metres overnight. Expect 1 to 3 cm to accumulate about the summit, with lesser amounts lower down.
